title: I'm in my Silver 3 series.
body:
not much of an accomplishment, but going from a 38% win rate to a 117W/118L feels pretty good. I feel like I've grown a lot as a league player this season. whether or not I get into Silver III, I am still happy with how far I've come as a player.

OMG... this guy is terrible, he is  ONE WIN AND EIGHT LOSSES as hecarim

OMG... this guy is a god... 22wins 10 losses as lux? 24 wins 11 losses as graves? must be boosted.

tbh though I really have just found my core 5 champions and never deviate unless absolutely necessary.
